dcfield_domain_example
======================

.. py:module:: dcfield_domain_example

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   DC Field Domain Example
   =======================

   Domain Example: Solve actual scientific problem with physical context
   Style: Connect code parameters to domain knowledge, interpret results
   Audience: Domain expert validating methodology

   This example solves the problem of analyzing DC field transport in quantum wire
   semiconductor devices for optoelectronic applications, connecting physical
   parameters to device performance metrics.



Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   dcfield_domain_example.HAS_MATPLOTLIB
   dcfield_domain_example.hbar
   dcfield_domain_example.e0
   dcfield_domain_example.eps0
   dcfield_domain_example.kB


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   dcfield_domain_example.setup_gaas_quantum_wire_device
   dcfield_domain_example.create_quantum_confined_states
   dcfield_domain_example.calculate_equilibrium_distributions
   dcfield_domain_example.calculate_coulomb_interactions
   dcfield_domain_example.analyze_device_performance
   dcfield_domain_example.analyze_field_dependence
   dcfield_domain_example.create_domain_visualization
   dcfield_domain_example.main


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: HAS_MATPLOTLIB
   :value: True


.. py:data:: hbar
   :value: 1.054571817e-34


.. py:data:: e0
   :value: 1.602176634e-19


.. py:data:: eps0
   :value: 8.8541878128e-12


.. py:data:: kB
   :value: 1.380649e-23


.. py:function:: setup_gaas_quantum_wire_device()

   Setup realistic GaAs quantum wire device parameters.


.. py:function:: create_quantum_confined_states(params)

   Create quantum confined states for the wire.


.. py:function:: calculate_equilibrium_distributions(ky, Ee, Eh, params)

   Calculate equilibrium carrier distributions.


.. py:function:: calculate_coulomb_interactions(ky, params)

   Calculate realistic Coulomb interaction matrices.


.. py:function:: analyze_device_performance(ky, Ee, Eh, ne, nh, Vee, Vhh, Cq2, params)

   Analyze device performance metrics.


.. py:function:: analyze_field_dependence(ky, Ee, Eh, ne, nh, Vee, Vhh, Cq2, params)

   Analyze field dependence for device optimization.


.. py:function:: create_domain_visualization(ky, Ee, Eh, ne, nh, performance, field_results, params)

   Create domain-specific visualization.


.. py:function:: main()

   Main domain example.
